scripts.dev: pnpm --filter @gitchorus/shared build && concurrently -k -n web,desktop -c cyan,yellow "pnpm dev:web" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/desktop dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @gitchorus/shared build && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/web build && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/desktop build
scripts.test: pnpm build:packages && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/shared test && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/desktop test && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/web test
scripts.test:cov: pnpm build:packages && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/shared test:cov && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/desktop test:cov && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/web test:cov
scripts.typecheck: pnpm build:packages && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/web typecheck && pnpm --filter @gitchorus/desktop typecheck
